meanings.definition: The state or quality of being clonic.
meanings.sent1: The clonicity of his movements was evident after the seizure.
meanings.sent2: The doctor observed the clonicity of the patient's muscles during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The clonicity of the dancer's performance added a unique flair to the routine.
meanings.sent4: The clonicity of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The clonicity of the music's rhythm made it impossible not to dance.
